body.p: Physician. Born in August 1840 in Wales. Immigrated to the United States in 1840. Married in 1868 to Francisca H. Griffiths. Children included Edith H., Kate G., Ella M., Grace, Bessie G., Ethel L. Died on April 10, 1908 in Louisville.
